[{"id":"JT-48158","entityId":"25-2043773","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48158"},{"name":"summary","value":"No visible scrollbar for CF with input size 1"},{"name":"description","value":"

build 43284

STR:

  1. Set input size (lines) for text CF to 1 line
  2. In some issue type few lines in this field

AR:
Only first line is visible, no scrollbar is shown, it's unclear that in fact it's possible to scroll this line and see more text in field

Open https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/YTB-422 with it's activities opened.
Scroll down and press 'Load More'

build 42711

STR:

  1. Update project logo
  2. In the same tab go to overview of this project
  3. Then go to the projects list

AR:
On both pages there's old logo instead of new

After page refresh actual logo is shown

How item selection should work?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529484479089,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2919033","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think we should select every single item. It's important for spent time items because we have actions on them.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529488128367,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-45884","entityId":"25-1870937","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"45884"},{"name":"summary","value":"Better presentation for issue changed notification"},{"name":"description","value":"
Live stream update. Some improvements for JT-44464

For any active switcher (comment/history item/VCS changes/Upsourse reviews/Spent time)
If we can see a change it's just blink

If we can't see a change we should show anchor link on the last changed item with a counter. In this case the "3 New comments"

And in this case "15 new changes" because 2 switches are active.

For inactive switcher (comment/history item/VCS changes/Upsourse reviews/Spent time)
We should show red bulb with a counter. On hover shows a tooltip with info.

Also, this panel should stick to the bottom


Version 1…
Version 1
1) Only custom fields updates show like popup
2) Better presentation of how many and what kind of changes you have

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1519198820399,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2755662","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov "red fucker" looks like I have some problem to be solved, but it's just information that good to know

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521212526095,"updated":1521212573205,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2756106","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Alexander Anisimov Google's inbox also use "red fucker" for notifications

These signs should be visible and should catch user's attention and "red fucker" is a common pattern in the web to do this.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521224870478,"updated":1521224896236,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2756752","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521324571029,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2757560","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521444105642,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2757828","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521450284614,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2767122","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-45884","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

We have decided delay this issue until we will fix JT-46057 and implement "Live update for issues's custom fields"

1. Goto issue list, select issue and click create issue relates to
2. Click on "+" for link issue

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1530712802651"},{"name":"updated","value":"1531128318397"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Mikhail.Kapusta"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mikhail Kapusta"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"permittedGroup","value":"YouTrack Team"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-870","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"mitya","fullName":"Dmitry Gizatov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Design"],"valueId":["Frontend","Design"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 71","id":"YouTrack:sprint 71"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48008","entityId":"25-2037398","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48008"},{"name":"summary","value":"Design review for ring-ui@1.0"},{"name":"description","value":"
1. new control uses by hub vs old YT control
hub uses toggle control vs checkbox on YT (guess we need uniform it)

2. Background for YT admin page vs hub (white vs gray)
I guess we should have same background for all admin pages

3. interligne for query arrist. I guess we need reduce it
compare old with new:

4. Font size becomes less for some text and links (12px vs 13px)

5. Strange color #FF008C for the star (and for link to issue, after clone)

7. interligne for some hub-admin pages was reduced (the readability become worse)
Compare old users vs new

8. Outline for tabs

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520263768470,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2731167","author":"Andrey.Skladchikov","authorFullName":"Andrey Skladchikov","issueId":"JT-44295","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin There is a wrapper around Query Assist in YouTrack. According to my past experience, this kind of bugs are usually caused by it – we don't have anything like this in Hub or Upsource. So we need to check it first
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520265352356,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2731618","author":"Andrey.Skladchikov","authorFullName":"Andrey Skladchikov","issueId":"JT-44295","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin I think I can investigate it. Sometimes I experience this on our agile board
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520279064837,"updated":1520279310375,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2733227","author":"Andrey.Skladchikov","authorFullName":"Andrey Skladchikov","issueId":"JT-44295","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
It is now clear that cursor is moved by setting caret position back from YT wrapper. Sometimes it reacts late and sends previous caret position after next symbol has been typed. It is easier to reproduce if one throttles CPU in Chrome to 6x times. https://upsource.jetbrains.com/youtrack/file/b84a6938a896894e7337f51b5a2afb8fe8ad66bd/charisma/youtrack-frontend/app/components/query-assist/directive/yt-query-assist.js?nav=2149:2180:focused&line=118&preview=false
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520348681341,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2733360","author":"Andrey.Skladchikov","authorFullName":"Andrey Skladchikov","issueId":"JT-44295","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

My previous assumption was wrong, i've found the issue RG-1720 in Ring UI "Query Assist" itself. @Ekaterina Zaikina Please update Ring UI when build 0.4.33 is ready.
